articles.author: hackerlytest
articles.title: Show HN: Trilby for Hacker News – An Elegant Way to Experience HN on Android
articles.description:
Fellow HNers,
I just published a brand new Hacker News client for Android. This is my first mobile app ever, and I worked on this for the last two months.It features / lets you:
 Browse and read Hacker News - view popular and latest articles.
 Beautiful desig…
articles.content: Trilby is a beautiful, and thoughtfully created Hacker News client for your device.The app lets you browse and interact with Hacker News the way you want.It features / lets you:Browse and read Hacker… [+1402 chars]
